name: Project Router
updateContentCommand: echo 'Choose a project to open: backend or frontend'

postAttachCommand.server: bash -c 'echo Select a project to open: && echo 1. Backend && echo 2. Frontend && read -p "Enter your choice (1 or 2): " choice && if [ "$choice" = "1" ]; then cd backend && devcontainer open .; elif [ "$choice" = "2" ]; then cd frontend && devcontainer open .; else echo Invalid choice; fi'
